editorialNotes.standard: Quickly sift through colourful clutter to find identical items in this clever spin on match-3 puzzling.

Hipster Whale's Apple Design Awardâwinning game takes a timeless arcade formulaâcross a road bustling with traffic and deadly obstaclesâand transforms it into an adorable infinite runner. As you progress, youâll unlock new characters with wildly diverse looks and effects. Thereâs a teeny-tiny flea, an emo goose, and even a few characters from other gamesâlike Epoch, who sprays cars with blocky bullets. The creativity and care put into Crossy Roadâs wacky world are unmistakable.

Tomb of the Mask: Pixel Maze

editorialNotes.standard: Speed is survival in this devilishly fast tomb-raiding arcade game. Like some glorious mix of Indiana Jones and Pac-Man, you race from room to room, nabbing all the coins you can while staying ahead of an ever-moving (and lethal) wall. With its crafty mazes, tricky traps, simple controls, and eye-popping retro minimalism, itâs an experience youâll happily lose yourself in.
